news.title: Wild Pixels Tournament Series Announced
news.content:
Get ready for battle!

We’re launching the *Wild Pixels Tournament Series* this fall. Compete in weekly brackets, climb the leaderboard, and earn exclusive digital rewards.

Whether you're a solo warrior or a team strategist — the arena awaits you.

news.title: Community Nights Begin
news.content:
Join us every Friday for community game nights!

Share builds, test ideas, or just vibe with others who love games.
news.trailer: First session starts **August 16th** — see you on Discord!

news.title: Devlog Incoming
news.content:
We’re opening up our development process.

Follow our *devlogs* and help shape the **Wild Pixels** experience together.
